ValidationRule.description: CQ created on a verizon account, but user is changing account legal entity to a LE which is not matching to the QTC number the validation needs to fire. Req #6129
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile" ),CQ_eQuote__c , Quote_Type__c = 'CQ', NOT( ISNEW() ), AND( ISCHANGED(Account_Legal_Entity__c), Account_Legal_Entity__r.QTC_Sold_To__c <> '8000405' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "QTC Sold To" value on the "Account Legal Entity" is required to be "8000405" for Verizon Quotes
